Authors: Marco Contu, Alfredo Justo, Alfredo Vizzini
Title:
Additional records of Volvariella dunensis (Basidiomycota,
Agaricales): morphological and molecular characterization
Abstract:
Collections morphologically assignable to Volvariella
dunensis from Sardinia and the Atlantic coast of Spain were revised and
compared to the original collections of this taxon. Molecular data
indicate that all collections examined represent V. dunensis therefore
expanding the known geographic distribution of this species. A revised
morphological characterization and a phylogenetic analysis of all
Volvariella species sequenced to date are provided.
